# LocationalAstro - Astrocartography Web Application

## Project Overview
LocationalAstro is a comprehensive interactive web application that generates professional astrocartography maps based on birth data. The application shows curved planetary lines across a world map indicating locations where planets were on specific angles (AC/DC/MC/IC) at the time of birth.

## Core Functionality
- **Interactive Astrocartography Maps**: Generate personalized astrocartography maps using birth data (date, time, location)
- **Planetary Line Calculations**: Display curved AC/DC lines and straight MC/IC longitude lines for 13 celestial points
- **City Database**: Shows 100+ major world cities as interactive points with hover tooltips
- **Multi-language Support**: Full English and Turkish translations with smart language detection
- **Map Export**: Save astrology maps as PNG images
- **URL Sharing**: Generate shareable links for astrocartography maps

## Technical Architecture
- **Frontend**: HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript (ES6+)
- **Mapping**: Leaflet.js for interactive world map
- **UI/UX**: Glassmorphism design with responsive breakpoints
- **Geocoding**: Integrated location search and coordinate conversion
- **Astronomical Calculations**: Real-time zodiac calculations and planetary position algorithms

## File Structure
- `index.html` - Landing page with project introduction
- `map.html` - Interactive astrocartography map generator  
- `script.js` - Core JavaScript functionality (3000+ lines)
- `styles.css` - Responsive CSS styling with modern design
- `images/` - Image assets and icons
- Configuration files: `browserconfig.xml`, `site.webmanifest`, `robots.txt`, `sitemap.xml`

## Key Features
### Astronomical Features
- **13 Celestial Points**: Sun, Moon, Mercury, Venus, Mars, Jupiter, Saturn, Uranus, Neptune, Pluto, North Node, Chiron, Lilith, Part of Fortune
- **4 Angles Per Planet**: Ascendant (AC), Descendant (DC), Midheaven (MC), Imum Coeli (IC)
- **52 Total Line Types**: Each with unique colors and astrological interpretations
- **Zodiac Integration**: Sun/Moon/Rising signs with personality trait descriptions

### User Experience Features
- **One-click Geocoding**: Enter any city name to get coordinates automatically
- **Touch-friendly Interface**: Optimized for mobile devices
- **Keyboard Shortcuts**: Enter key for geocoding functionality
- **Auto-load from URLs**: Maps load automatically from shared parameters
- **Professional Interpretations**: 52 unique interpretations for all planet-angle combinations

### Technical Features
- **Responsive Design**: Breakpoints for desktop, tablet, and mobile
- **Modern Web Standards**: Progressive web app capabilities
- **Cross-browser Compatibility**: Works across all modern browsers
- **Performance Optimized**: Efficient rendering of complex planetary calculations
